text: jab vah qayaamat ke din tum sabako jama karega phir yahee haar jeet ka din hoga aur jo shakhsh khuda par eemaan lae aur achchha kaam kare vah usase usakee buraiyaan door kar dega aur usako (behisht mein) un baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain vah unamen abaadul aabaad hamesha rahega, yahee to badee kaamayaabee hai
